m_szDocSumamry: Hyperion Announces First Customer For Small Nuclear Reactor August 14th, 2008 by Rod Adams   Hyperion Power Generation issued a press release on August 12, 2008 announcing that their first customer had signed a letter of intent (LOI) to purchase 6 Hyperion Power ModulesTM (HPM), which the company describes as “a small, compact, transportable, nuclear power reactor”. Each HPM will be priced at approximately $25 million.
